member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .

member.name: M:toofz.NecroDancer.Web.Api.Controllers.LeaderboardsController.GetLeaderboards(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of Crypt of the NecroDancer leaderboards.
member.param: Valid values are 'classic' and 'amplified'. If not provided, returns leaderboards from all products.
Valid values are 'standard', 'no-return', 'hard', 'phasing', 'randomzier', and 'mystery'. If not provided, returns leaderboards from all modes.
Valid values are 'score', 'speed', 'seeded-score', 'seeded-speed', and 'deathless'. If not provided, returns leaderboards from all runs.

Valid values are 'all-characters', 'all-characters-amplified', 'aria', 'bard', 'bolt', 'cadence', 'coda', 'diamond', 'dorian', 'dove', 'eli', 'mary', 'melody', 'monk', 'nocturna', 'story-mode', and 'tempo'. If not provided, returns leaderboards from all characters.
A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: Returns a list of Crypt of the NecroDancer leaderboards.

member.returns: Returns a list of Crypt of the NecroDancer leaderboard entries.

member.summary: Search for Steam players.
member.param: Comma-separated values of properties to sort by. Properties may be prefixed with "-" to sort descending. Valid properties are "id", "display_name", "updated_at", and "entries". If not provided, results will sorted using "-entries,display_name,id".
A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: Returns a list of Steam players that match the search query.
